channel.title: CMEcorner2go: Reducing Peptic Ulcer Complications in the Elderly
channel.itunes:author: CMEcorner.com
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to CMEcorner2go, an educational service of CME Corner (CMEcorner.com). Earn CE (continuing education) credit by participating in this FREE audio podcast. CME Corner is dedicated to providing quality medical education for health care professionals. To view our full selection of CME and CE programs and podcasts, please visit us online at www.CMEcorner.com.

item.title: MP3: Reducing Peptic Ulcer Complications in the Elderly
item.itunes:author: CMEcorner.com
item.description: This CME/CE activity is provided free of charge. Play this MP3 file in your selected Media Player. Please view the accompanying PDF for credit details.
item.itunes:keywords: CME, continuing medical education, Ulcer, NSAID, proton pump inhibitor, COX-2, coxib, esomeprazole, omeprazole, lansoprazole, pantoprazole, rabeprazole

item.title: PDF: Reducing Peptic Ulcer Complications in the Elderly
